channel.title: My 1st ever model
channel.description:
hey this is my 1st ever model i used primatives to make it, and umm... here they are :D [img]http://img51.imageshack.us/i/swordpicplan.png/[/img] [img]http://img408.imageshack.us/i/swordpicback.png/[/img] [img]http://img145.imageshack.us/i/swordpic1.png/[/img]
and yes i know they are shoddy and terrible but i will become average one day! :)
and if anyone can tell me what makes a good model. or what couuld improve mine. that would be great thanks! feel free to flame :cool:
if pics are brocken there at this link http://img145.imageshack.us/gal.php?g=swordpic1.png
------------------------------ second ------------------------------
because my 1st was horrible i decided to try and get a different one out hopefully abit less horrible this time critisism = good
http://img195.imageshack.us/gal.php?g=frontv.png
all there please and ty, mase out

item.title: My 1st ever model
item.dc:creator: @urbaninja urbaninja
item.description:
@urbaninja wrote:

thanks for the help any ideas to start on?

Read full topic

item.title: My 1st ever model
item.dc:creator: @qadh qadh
item.description:
@qadh wrote:

#1
The hilt should be longer and yes sharp.
More detail within the sword.
Try something other then swords when you finish you feel so much better
overall: 7/10
#2
I have to admit this is quite a model must have used a lot of imagination
The handle is too big and awkwardly shaped.
The swords are too thick giving me the the impression they may not slice through a person.
All in all i have to give it to you 6/10

(p.s. Remember when you are posting pictures to include a wireframe view. This can be accomplished by taking a picture while the Ln button at the top left is left clicked)
Good job for your first try i hope to see you try something new.

Read full topic

@reyx7 wrote:

I’m glad some people here can take Constructive Criticism

item.title: My 1st ever model
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

1.Good job for using primitives
2.Blade is short
3.Blade is not pointy
4.The back part just looks weird
5.Long part of hilt looks awkward.
